name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avengers Infinity War Earth’s Mightiest Heroes Unite  Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Earth’s Mightiest Heroes in Avengers: Infinity War live wallpaper featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Iconic scenes of the Avengers teaming up to face Thanos in stunning visuals.
Minimalist Design: Clean, modern interface for smooth and immersive browsing.
Clock and Date: Stay updated with a visible time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Fast and reliable search functionality.
More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with added features.
